newsArray.title: PCB issues legal notice to South African all-rounder Corbin Bosch
creator: Shahid Hashmi
newsArray.description: LAHORE: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has served a legal notice to South African all-rounder Corbin Bosch for breaching his contractual obligations with the Pakistan Super League (PSL) on Sunday. Bosch was selected by Peshawar Zalmi in the PSL player draft held on 13 February in Lahore. However, Indian Premier League (IPL) franchise, Mumbai Indians, [...]The post PCB issues legal notice to South African all-rounder Corbin Bosch appeared first on ASports.tv.

newsArray.title: Abhishek Porel on Delhi Capitals Future: KL Rahul’s Impact, Bond with Axar Patel, and Team Strategy
newsArray.description: Delhi Capitals’ wicket-keeper batter Abhishek Porel opens up about his aspirations, experiences, and growth as a cricketer ahead of IPL 2025. In an in-depth conversation, Porel shares insights into his evolving game, key improvements, and the lessons learned from previous seasons. He also discusses his strong camaraderie with Axar Patel, who has been appointed as the new captain of Delhi Capitals, and how their bond could shape the team’s dynamics. Additionally, Porel reflects on the potential impact of KL Rahul’s arrival in the squad, analysing the adjustments he might have to make in his role within the team.

creator: PTI
newsArray.description: New Delhi, Mar 16 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi does not consider himself a cricket expert but emphasised that recent results showed India was a better team than Pakistan and also underlined the role of sport in bringing people together. Modi shared his views during a free-wheeling conversation with popular American podcaster Lex Fridman on [...]

newsArray.title: Orange Cap In IPL 2025: आईपीएल में ये 5 खिलाड़ी जीत सकते हैं ऑरेंज कैप, लिस्ट में एक से बढ़कर एक धुरंधर
newsArray.description: आईपीएल 2025 में विराट कोहली के प्रदर्शन का सभी क्रिकेट प्रशंसकों को बेसब्री से इंतजार है। हर एक खिलाड़ी अपने अद्वितीय कौशल के साथ मैदान में उतरने के लिए तैयार है और यह सीजन ऑरेंज कैप के लिए एक कड़ी प्रतिस्पर्धा देखने को मिल सकती है।

newsArray.title: Video: హర్దిక్ నోట చెన్నై పేరు.. ప్రస్ట్రేషన్‌తో ఊగిపోయిన రోహిత్.. ఏం చేశాడో తెలుసా?
creator: Venkata Chari
newsArray.description: Rohit Sharma's Furious Reaction: ఐపీఎల్ 2025లో చెన్నై సూపర్ కింగ్స్ వర్సెస్ ముంబై ఇండియన్స్ మధ్య జరిగే మ్యాచ్ కోసం అంచనాలు భారీగా ఉన్నాయి. చెన్నై మ్యాచ్ గురించి విన్న వెంటనే ముంబై మాజీ కెప్టెన్ రోహిత్ శర్మ కోపంతో జ్యూస్ గ్లాస్ పగలగొట్టిన వీడియో సోషల్ మీడియాలో వైరల్ అవుతోంది. రెండు జట్లు ఐపీఎల్‌లో మంచి ప్రదర్శన ఇచ్చాయి, ఈ మ్యాచ్‌పై ఇప్పటికే అంచనాలు భారీగా పెరిగాయి.

newsArray.title: ಪಾಕ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗನ ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹಾಡುಹಗಲೇ ಕಳ್ಳತನ; ಅಳವಡಿಸಿದ ಮರುದಿನವೇ ಸೌರ ಫಲಕಗಳು ನಾಪತ್ತೆ
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: Daylight Robbery at Kamran Akmal's House: ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನದ ಮಾಜಿ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗರಾದ ಕಮ್ರಾನ್ ಮತ್ತು ಉಮರ್ ಅಕ್ಮಲ್ ಅವರ ತಂದೆಯ ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹಗಲು ಹೊತ್ತಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಕಳ್ಳತನ ನಡೆದಿದೆ. 5 ಲಕ್ಷ ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನಿ ರೂಪಾಯಿಗಳಷ್ಟು ಮೌಲ್ಯದ ಹೊಸದಾಗಿ ಅಳವಡಿಸಲಾದ ಸೌರ ಫಲಕಗಳನ್ನು ಕಳ್ಳರು ಕದ್ದೊಯ್ದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಲಾಹೋರ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ಈ ಘಟನೆಯ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಪೊಲೀಸರು ತನಿಖೆ ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದ್ದು, ಸಿಸಿಟಿವಿ ದೃಶ್ಯಾವಳಿಗಳನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತಿದೆ.

newsArray.title: Abhishek Porel on Delhi Capitals Future: KL Rahul’s Impact, Bond with Axar Patel, and Team Strategy
newsArray.description: Delhi Capitals’ wicket-keeper batter Abhishek Porel opens up about his aspirations, experiences, and growth as a cricketer ahead of IPL 2025. In an in-depth conversation, Porel shares insights into his evolving game, key improvements, and the lessons learned from previous seasons. He also discusses his strong camaraderie with Axar Patel, who has been appointed as the new captain of Delhi Capitals, and how their bond could shape the team’s dynamics. Additionally, Porel reflects on the potential impact of KL Rahul’s arrival in the squad, analysing the adjustments he might have to make in his role within the team.

newsArray.title: Recent results show Indian cricket team is better than Pakistan: Modi
creator: PTI
newsArray.description: New Delhi, Mar 16 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi does not consider himself a cricket expert but emphasised that recent results showed India was a better team than Pakistan and also underlined the role of sport in bringing people together. Modi shared his views during a free-wheeling conversation with popular American podcaster Lex Fridman on [...]

newsArray.title: Orange Cap In IPL 2025: आईपीएल में ये 5 खिलाड़ी जीत सकते हैं ऑरेंज कैप, लिस्ट में एक से बढ़कर एक धुरंधर
newsArray.description: आईपीएल 2025 में विराट कोहली के प्रदर्शन का सभी क्रिकेट प्रशंसकों को बेसब्री से इंतजार है। हर एक खिलाड़ी अपने अद्वितीय कौशल के साथ मैदान में उतरने के लिए तैयार है और यह सीजन ऑरेंज कैप के लिए एक कड़ी प्रतिस्पर्धा देखने को मिल सकती है।

newsArray.title: Video: హర్దిక్ నోట చెన్నై పేరు.. ప్రస్ట్రేషన్‌తో ఊగిపోయిన రోహిత్.. ఏం చేశాడో తెలుసా?
creator: Venkata Chari
newsArray.description: Rohit Sharma's Furious Reaction: ఐపీఎల్ 2025లో చెన్నై సూపర్ కింగ్స్ వర్సెస్ ముంబై ఇండియన్స్ మధ్య జరిగే మ్యాచ్ కోసం అంచనాలు భారీగా ఉన్నాయి. చెన్నై మ్యాచ్ గురించి విన్న వెంటనే ముంబై మాజీ కెప్టెన్ రోహిత్ శర్మ కోపంతో జ్యూస్ గ్లాస్ పగలగొట్టిన వీడియో సోషల్ మీడియాలో వైరల్ అవుతోంది. రెండు జట్లు ఐపీఎల్‌లో మంచి ప్రదర్శన ఇచ్చాయి, ఈ మ్యాచ్‌పై ఇప్పటికే అంచనాలు భారీగా పెరిగాయి.

newsArray.title: ಪಾಕ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗನ ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹಾಡುಹಗಲೇ ಕಳ್ಳತನ; ಅಳವಡಿಸಿದ ಮರುದಿನವೇ ಸೌರ ಫಲಕಗಳು ನಾಪತ್ತೆ
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: Daylight Robbery at Kamran Akmal's House: ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನದ ಮಾಜಿ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗರಾದ ಕಮ್ರಾನ್ ಮತ್ತು ಉಮರ್ ಅಕ್ಮಲ್ ಅವರ ತಂದೆಯ ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹಗಲು ಹೊತ್ತಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಕಳ್ಳತನ ನಡೆದಿದೆ. 5 ಲಕ್ಷ ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನಿ ರೂಪಾಯಿಗಳಷ್ಟು ಮೌಲ್ಯದ ಹೊಸದಾಗಿ ಅಳವಡಿಸಲಾದ ಸೌರ ಫಲಕಗಳನ್ನು ಕಳ್ಳರು ಕದ್ದೊಯ್ದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಲಾಹೋರ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ಈ ಘಟನೆಯ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಪೊಲೀಸರು ತನಿಖೆ ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದ್ದು, ಸಿಸಿಟಿವಿ ದೃಶ್ಯಾವಳಿಗಳನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತಿದೆ.
